Player History
Injured on 5/3/2002 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 5/17/2002, off Jeremy Affeldt (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/23/2002, off Mark Hendrickson (NYM)...
Released by Cincinnati on 2/25/2006...
Drafted in 6th round, 149th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2010...
Released by Los Angeles on 5/17/2010...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 3/1/2018 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 4/9/2019 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 5 days...
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 1978...
Injured on 6/27/1980 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/4/1980 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1984, off Gary Nolan (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/7/1984, off George Stablein (CHC)...
Injured on 4/24/1985 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1986...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 5/15/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1988, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis on 5/26/1988...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1988, hitting .424 with 5 HR, 16 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/6/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $7,500,000 per year...
